attributes.action: crate a hotel in london for members of parliment to stay in while on parlimentory buisiness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: instead of ministers claiming for second homes ect why not have a hotel in London which they must stay while doing parlimentory work.It could have office staff for them to use,a restuarant and bar and any other facilities that they require for their stay.This would then allow them to do the job they are paid for and not spend time juggling their expences.
